short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Power of AI(ChatGPT) directly on Job search sites like Indeed.com, Linkedin.com etc

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your personal, AI-powered, job search partner!

In today's competitive job market, increasingly companies use AI to screen candidates.

You need your own personal AI Help.

This extension provides a AI sidebar that uses ChatGPT to answer questions on job search sites such as Linkedin, Indeed, SImplyhired and others.
        
You need to login to ChatGPT to use this extension. Chatgpt link: https://www.ai.com/
